snippet.title: Title: Triple stack glass-to-glass anodic bonding for optogalvanic spectroscopy cells with electrical feedthroughs
snippet.description:
Title: Triple stack glass-to-glass anodic bonding for optogalvanic spectroscopy cells with electrical feedthroughs
Authors: Renate Daschner, Harald Kübler, Robert Löw, Holger Baur, Norbert Frühauf, Tilman Pfau
Subjects: Atomic Physics (physics.atom-ph); Instrumentation and Detectors (physics.ins-det)

snippet.title: Title: Laser scribing on HOPG for graphene stamp printing on silicon wafer
snippet.description:
Title: Laser scribing on HOPG for graphene stamp printing on silicon wafer
Authors: Jelena Butikova, Boris Polyakov, Lauris Dimitrocenko, Edgars Butanovs, Ivars Tale
